name: Lobster Empire
description: Lobster Empire is a game in which you build up your own lobster business, developing better fishing techniques and ways to create long-lasting and profitable lobster resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3, 32-bit Processor: Intel i3 550 or AMD Phenom II X4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM. Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WindowsÂ® 7/8/10, 64-bit Processor: Intel i3 550 or AMD Phenom II X4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM. Storage: 250 MB available space
